import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import data from '../data'; function ProductDetail(props){ console.log(props.match.params.id); const product = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id) return
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars {product.numReviews} reviews
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
} export default ProductDetail;
